data.content: All 4 child knots (e5f5, 0e94, 73c5, 0770) implemented and pushed to main. SHA=107ab6b. Introduced WorkflowStep/StepPhase/resolveStep abstraction, refactored all internal helpers and both backends, fixed take-loop stop condition, added parity tests, removed dead code. 8 files changed, +317/-140. All gates green (991 tests, 0 lint errors, 0 type errors, build success).
